oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Continental Imperial House Apartments, Nashville, Tennessee, 1962 February 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The construction of the Continental Imperial House apartment building at 1808 West End Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, February 16th, 1962. The 1963 City Directory cites the “Imperial House Leasing,” with Charles F. Reeves, Leasing Agent. The sign in the photo names the leasing agent, as well as Swenson & Kott, Architects, and the Southern Builders, Inc. of Tennessee. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Reeves, Charles F.
Imperial House Leasing (Nashville, Tenn.)
